document_data.mainbody:
The Lions was a small road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
The Lions was located in the southwest section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward. The Lions branched off of Diamond Street just east of that roads intersection with Westwall Street. It passed southeast through the Sea Ward, terminating at Julthoon Street after passing the Field of Triumph where it formed its eastern border. Other roads connecting with the Lions included Dobs Loss, Gulzindar Street, Seawatch Street, and Jelzars Stride.
* Field of Triumph
* House of Heroes
